Member Function Documentation

void BHV_CA::findNeighbours (  double  rangeRadious  )  [protected]
 

Finds the all neighbours in the given range.

All vehicle names registered in the moos environment are inspected and neighbours are selected based on their name. For instance if all the kayaks are named kayak1, kayak2, ... kayakn, the neighbours to kayak1 will be those with name kayakn and range < rangeRadious.

Parameters:
rangeRadious vehicle that have a range < rangeRadious will be looked at.
TBD now only looking at vehicle with same name, might want to change that. String comparison is also done by the first 3 chars...

double BHV_CA::getPriority (   )  [protected]
 

Calculets the priority for the behavior depending on the distance to the target.

If targetRange is grater then targetRangeMax then the priority is set to the priority weight paramater -- priority_wt -- which is in the range [0,100]. The priority then drops linearly when targetRange is in [targetRangeMin,targetRangeMax] and is 0 for targetRange < targetRangeMin.

Returns:
the priority in the range of [0,priority_wt]

IvPFunction * BHV_CA::produceOF (   ) 
 

Creates an objective function.

Note:
All state updates are done here.

bool BHV_CA::setParam (  string  param,
string  val
) 
 

Reads parameters from .bhv file.

Is called repeatedly until all parameters are read within the block.

Parameters:
param the current parameter parsed the .bhv file.
val the string value of that parameter.
Returns:
true if the parameter was found and successfully set, false otherwise.

Member Data Documentation

vector<Neighbour > BHV_CA::neighbours [private]
 

Information about close by neighbours is stored here with the closest one firts.

See findNeighbours().
